name: border
description: Puts a border on the element. Accepts top | right | bottom | left.

name: close-label
description: Text used for aria-label on dismissible alerts.

name: color
description: Applies specified color to the control - it can be the name of material color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5))

name: colored-border
description: Swap color from the background to the border for an alternative border look.

name: dark
description: Applies the dark theme variant

name: dense
description: Hides icon and decreases component height for a more simplistic alert.

name: dismissible
description: Specifies that the Alert can be closed.

name: elevation
description: Designates an elevation between 0 and 24

name: height
description: Sets the component height

name: icon
description: Designates a specific icon.

name: light
description: Applies the light theme variant

name: max-height
description: Sets the maximum height for the content

name: max-width
description: Sets the maximum width for the content

name: min-height
description: Sets the minimum height for the content

name: min-width
description: Sets the minimum width for the content

name: mode
description: Sets the transition mode (does not apply to transition-group)

name: origin
description: Sets the transition origin

name: outlined
description: Alert will have an outline.

name: prominent
description: Displays a larger vertically centered icon to draw more attention.

name: tag
description: Specifies a tag

name: text
description: Make the background transparent and color the text.

name: tile
description: Removes the component's border-radius

name: transition
description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the built in transitions or your own.

name: type
description: Specify a success, info, warning or error alert. Uses the contextual color and a pre-defined icon.

name: value
description: Controls visibility

name: width
description: The width of the content
